item.title: Wild Rides
item.description: ed. note: Nothing in this blog post should be taken as statement of fact unless I specifically write “at ${company}, ${thing} happened”. Everything else is my personal opinion based on aggregate experiences. The facts In September 2022, Nearside was acquired by Plastiq, a company in the SMB/B2B payments space. In November, they announced that “due to macroeconomic conditions”, they would be shutting down all Nearside products - the Business Bank Account as well as Line of Credit â€“ by EOY, with most access being shut off in early December.
